description: This file defines a WebexTools class that provides methods to send messages and list rooms using the Webex API, including handling API errors and environment variable configuration.

classes.name: WebexTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with Webex, capable of sending messages and listing rooms.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the WebexTools class, setting up the Webex API client and available tools based on parameters.

methods.name: send_message
methods.description: Sends a message to a specified Webex room and returns the response as a JSON string.

methods.name: list_rooms
methods.description: Lists all Webex rooms accessible with the API token and returns the list as a formatted JSON string.
